data.actual_result: There is no banner for 2-4 seconds making you miss it while watching a video and leaving you confused.
data.expected_result: The banner should appear since you have new mentions
data.short_description: When you're full-screened on a video and get mentioned, there is no "New" mention banner in the server list for like 2-3 seconds
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure the server is all the way the bottom (because of an another bug the server list scrolls up) - Go into fullscreen on a YouTube video in a server - Get mentioned in the server you moved to the bottom - Go out of fullscreen - Observe there is no "New" mention banner for a few seconds
